column4: anyone have experience with mdadm?  I've got a software raid10, I pulled a drive and reinserted it to see what would happen and the drive came back as /dev/sdf instead of /dev/sdb
is there a way to find a physical device to a virtual device so it comes back on the same device?
I'm not sure how to deal with it being on a different device, mdadm is still looking for sdb
interesting , but i think if you reboot with drive still connected it will revert to sdb
